price: តើពួកអ្នកបានបង្កើតដើមឈើ(ដើម្បីបង្កាត់)វា ឬមួយ យើងជាអ្នកបង្កើត?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
